meanings.definition: Provide money for (a project or activity)
meanings.sent1: The government funded the new school building.
meanings.sent2: She funded her research through a grant.
meanings.sent3: The cat funded its toy collection with stolen treats.
meanings.sent4: His passion for art funded his creativity.
meanings.sent5: The generous donation funded the entire charity event.

meanings.sent1: The funded project was a success.
meanings.sent2: They were part of a funded program for young entrepreneurs.
meanings.sent3: The funded team celebrated their victory with a party.
meanings.sent4: Her funded education opened up new opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The funded organization helped many people in need.
